channel.title: Rawr Sword
channel.description:
if(i == 13667) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11999; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11998; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11998; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "The Rawr Sword"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "I Have The Power!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
and dl http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1QY9UOQG and pic [IMG]http://i384.photobucket.com/albums/oo289/averyallenkey/Untitled-4.jpg[/img]
